description:
Sunshine is a Gamestream host for Moonlight.

Sunshine is a self hosted, low latency, cloud gaming solution with support for AMD,
Intel, and Nvidia GPUs.
It is an open source implementation of NVIDIA's GameStream, as used by the NVIDIA Shield.
Connect to Sunshine from any Moonlight client, available for nearly any device imaginable.
What's Changed
- fix(windows): Correct binPath syntax in install-service.bat by @ReenigneArcher in #4290
- build(macos): Remove XCode dependency by @eduardomozart in #4293
New Contributors
- @eduardomozart made their first contribution in #4293
Full Changelog: v2025.923.33222...v2025.924.154138
